summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights necessary for storm drain purposes for the project titled LAKE WASHINGTON - Southeast Sewer Improvement (Contract No. 6) in Brighton Beach Orchard Addition to the City of Seattle; Brighton Beach Acre Tracts Addition to the City of Seattle, Washington; Hillman City Addition to the City of Seattle division Number 6, and Hillman City Division No. 2; as a part of certain additions and betterments to the existing municipal sewerage utility and providing payment therefor.
